sectionHeader.title: Success Stories
sectionHeader.subtitle:
Meet the Successful
Discover the experiences of successful people with us

modal.title: Turning Talent into a Successful Project
content: Fatima is a creative young Bahraini woman with refined taste and a distinctive artistic touch in designing dresses and wedding gowns. She pursued her passion for art and elegance, channeling them into her project, which she named “Unique Chic.” Fatima’s reputation soared, and she became well-known among people due to her sophisticated choices, exceptional customer service, and reasonable prices.

Here, Fatima sought funding from Ebdaa for Microfinance (one of the AGFUND institutions) to grow her business further and purchase fabrics and equipment needed to elevate her unique venture even more.
Wishing you all the best, Fatima

modal.title: Partnership in Achievement
content: Mohammed Maher Abbas is a Bahraini young man with great ambition to improve his financial conditions and elevate his living standard. He thought of creating a private project to support the salary he receives from his main job in one of the private sector companies.

In 2016, Mohammed started a mobile bag and shoe selling project in commercial markets. He realized the importance of providing liquidity to implement the project idea first, then expand it second. He obtained three loans from Ebdaa Bahrain at different time periods worth 300 dinars, 400 dinars, and 600 dinars.

Mohammed's commitment to paying loan installments on time contributed to increasing his credibility and reliability with the bank, transforming the relationship from a bank-client relationship to a partnership and success relationship that continuously develops.

modal.title: Isa Ali's Success Story
content: Continuing project success requires continuous development in tools and equipment, which is exactly what Isa Naji Mohammed Ali understands. He lives in Hamad City and owns a garage in Al-Hamla area for repairing cars and motorcycles, with over five years of experience in repairing and programming car computers.

Isa wanted to expand his project and add a new type of equipment related to Hyundai cars, so he expressed his desire to finance this expansion through Ebdaa Bahrain loans. He got what he wanted by obtaining 2000 Bahraini dinars, which he is now working on repaying to the bank according to comfortable installments and full commitment.

modal.title: Hessa is ambitious Bahraini
content: Hessa is an ambitious Bahraini woman with a passion for baking. She taught herself how to bake and mastered the creation of delicious baked goods. After impressing those around her with her creations, she decided to launch her own home-based baking business.

Her treats quickly gained popularity, and the reputation of her delicious baked goods spread by word of mouth. Hessa then moved on to produce her baked goods at the "Netaj Khair Bahrain" cooperative, known for their exceptional taste and affordable prices.

Wanting to further develop her bakery, Hessa sought to upgrade her equipment to keep up with advancements in baking techniques. This is where Ebda’a Microfinance (one of the AGFUND institutions) stepped in, offering her the support and funding she needed. They continue to stand by her as long as her ambition lives on.

modal.title: gomaa the beekeeper
content: Jumaa is a passionate Bahraini who learned beekeeping from his teacher at school. After taking early retirement, he dedicated himself fully to beekeeping. What started as a simple hobby soon evolved into producing honey with unique colors and flavors.
Later, he launched his business under the name "Jumaa Bee," where he showcases and sells various products derived from bees and honey.
Today, Jumaa organizes educational programs about bees for school students and children, and he will soon launch programs that combine art with beekeeping.

modal.title: Ziyada is a hardworking Bahraini woman who built herself up from the ground.

content.0: Ziyada is a hardworking Bahraini woman who built herself up from the ground. She is one of the inspiring women from Bahrain’s golden generation—still creative, still ambitious. She runs a home-based business where she cooks and sells traditional Bahraini dishes along with various food products.
content.2: Her project stands out as a successful and unique one, thanks to the remarkable woman behind it who believed in her success and shared that belief with Ebda’a Microfinance (one of AGFUND’s institutions). Ebda’a has been supporting her journey since 2014 and continues to do so today.
content.4: Recently, Ziyada received a new loan which she used to purchase supplies, equipment, and kitchen essentials for her growing business—made possible first by God, and then by her relentless dedication and hard work.
content.6: Ebda’a remains committed to supporting Ziyada (and every determined, exceptional Bahraini woman like her) on the path to achieving her dreams and improving her quality of life.
content.8: Wishing you all the best, Ziyada!

modal.title: Laila is a talented Bahraini woman
content: Laila is a talented Bahraini woman, skilled in various forms of art—most notably design and handmade crafts. She started her small home-based business by creating beautiful handcrafted pieces right from her home.
Laila continued her work and gradually built a loyal customer base, becoming well-known in her field for her elegant designs, precision, and high quality.

As demand for her products grew and she needed to purchase more raw materials, she turned to Ebda’a Microfinance (one of AGFUND’s institutions) for financial support. Ebda’a was quick to respond, providing her with the funding she needed to grow her business.

modal.title: Ahmed is a young Bahraini man who is passionate about Bahrain’s heritage
content: Ahmed is a young Bahraini man who is passionate about Bahrain’s heritage and deeply connected to the charm and authenticity of the past. He turned his beautiful hobby of collecting heritage items and antiques into a small shop where he displays his collection and sells it to those who truly appreciate this cultural legacy.
